ygData.subject: Re: SharpClaw/KitKat/Cam
ygData.msgSnippet: Cam:: She heard the voice and growled in her little fox growl. It wasn t intimidating, in fact, it was almost cute. She growled at the voice. No, You leave

Cam::

She heard the voice and growled in her little fox growl. It wasn't 
intimidating, in fact, it was almost cute. She growled at the 
voice. "No, You leave her alone. We found her. She's ours. Get your 
own bot. Besides, she's a canine like us. We found her. We keep her. 
Don't you know the rules of Finder's Keeper's?"  She went stomping 
infront of the fallen wolf bot and stood over the tail of the bot. 
She spoke to the fallen bot. "Don't worry. I'll save you." Her little 
fox kit ears down and her little teeth bared. She raised her back and 
tried as hard as she could to look mean.


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> wrote:
> : : SharpClaw : :
> SharpClaw stayed back, observing KitKat and the bots. KitKat needed 
help, and these bots didn't seem to be harming her. They looked like 
they were going to help. One was even a child. It is no matter 
though, they were not Predacons.
> SharpClaw: Please allow me to take her. She needs help by her own 
people. You have not harmed her so I will not attack you. SharpClaw 
stayed out of sight, only his voice telling the Maximals that he was 
there.
> 
> Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:Blackfang came closer and smelled 
the wounded bot. He realized she was
> a predacon... but she was pretty... very pretty.
> 
> Blackfang: She's a pred, but she's wounded. We'd better take her to
> base. Can you find her shut down switch?
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679" <raccoon7679@y...> 
wrote:
> > Cam::
> > She sniffed at the bot. "It smells funny."
> > 
> > KitKat::
> > She panted hard and could barely move. She whispered  "pain, it 
> > hurts." She could barely keep her optics open.
> > 
> > 
> > Cam::
> > She looked up at Blackfang, "Think we should help it?"
> > 
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > > Blackfang had heard nothing but jumped after Cam. If there were
> > > enemies, it wasn't time for her to get caught again.
> > > 
> > > Blackfang: Careful, girl! It might be Preds... Be as silent as 
> > possible.
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679" <raccoon7679@y...> 
> > wrote:
> > > > KitKat::
> > > > She lay there under the bush, panting hard. Her commlink was 
on 
> > > > speaker mode, not silent mode. She winced in pain and tried 
to 
> > get 
> > > > up, but fell back on her side.
> > > > 
> > > > Cam::
> > > > Her little fox ears perked up as she let go of the drone. She 
> > looked 
> > > > up at Blackfang and tried to act all big. "Hear that noise? I 
> > thought 
> > > > it came from over there."  She pointed with her paw. Then, 
she 
> > dashed 
> > > > after it. "Come on Blackfang. I wanna see what's out there."
> > > > 
> > > > KitKat::
> > > > She was in too much pain to notice the sound of fox paws 
heading 
> > in 
> > > > her direction.
> > > > 
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen 
<roborick007@y...> 
> > wrote:
> > > > > : : SharpClaw : : SharpClaw had been watching everything in 
the 
> > > > holodeck in silence. He was now pretty good and pissed. He 
walks 
> > up 
> > > > to Maxima. SharpClaw: You are foolish. I suggest you start 
making 
> > > > friends. From what I've seen, your attitude serves no purpose 
but 
> > to 
> > > > piss bots off. That's dangerous. You dont need enemies within 
> > your 
> > > > own faction. He looks at Blackstorm. SharpClaw: You, my dear, 
> > show 
> > > > great promise. Let her program fighting ability into you, 
it'll 
> > help, 
> > > > but dont reply on it. Artificial programs are crap. We are 
> > > > transformers, we are more advanced then that. Instead of 
being 
> > > > programmed like simple computers, we should learn are skills 
> > > > ourselves. He walks out of the room, opening his comm.
